“Despite the chaos and confusion of our world, I see winds of hope blowing around the globe.”
— @antonioguterres to world leaders at #UNGA⁠ ⁠. https://t.co/PWPj7hrn7f

"We need to move ahead based on facts, not fear — on reason, not illusion."  
— @antonioguterres to world leaders at #UNGA. Watch: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf https://t.co/TKXquf5zIR

More & more people are getting their information from news or social media feeds that echo their views, reinforce tribalism & assure people that they are right and the other side is wrong.
-- @antonioguterres to world leaders at #UNGA. Watch: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf https://t.co/yIueCcXFYy

Our future is at stake.  Nothing is immune — climate change affects everything— and everything can be undermined.

The world needs you to be climate champions — all of you. 
—@antonioguterres to world leaders at #UNGA. Watch: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf https://t.co/sPctfQxR0G

Together, as guardians of the common good, we have a duty to promote and support a reformed, reinvigorated and strengthened multilateral system.
-- @antonioguterres to world leaders at #UNGA https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf https://t.co/113LdI9yP6

"He burned with the flame of human rights, dignity & justice. We shall miss him every day.  But we vow, here in the heart of his beloved home, that we will carry forward his torch now & forever more." -- @antonioguterres at Friday's UNHQ memorial service for @KofiAnnan. https://t.co/GZtuahMBcS

@Twitter @antonioguterres hope

"Peace is the unifying concept that brings us together at the United Nations.

Peace is violated in so many places. But we will not give up." 

-- @antonioguterres on Friday's #PeaceDay. https://t.co/YvrnAyoxfS

#FBF to the UN General Assembly Hall in New York just after its completion in 1952.
